>>37806434

> [[ 45 ]]

The tips of your fingers brush against hers, but your fist clamps shut with a handful of air. Then, she jumps to grab your wrist, pulling herself skyward with a high-pitched kiai. The Pegasus is starting to turn in the air, high above the cathedral floor, and Tatsumaki's climbing higher, reaching for you to grab on from above.

Oof! You feel your arm skid against the wall as you ascend, just barely. You yelp; this one almost stings. It's not the same dull feeling, but rather, a very aggressive and intrusive vibration origininating from your shoulder and shooting through your upper body.

> [[ Ascheritte: 18 / 24 HP ]]

"Ascheritte, careful!" Ayla shouts from below. Caster bolts are hitting the walls next to you and you don't know whether you're supposed to be dodging them or not. Tatsumaki yells something--you're not sure if it's English--but you look up to see her helping hand, and grab on, letting her pull you up. You're not glowing, by the time you get hold. Your Haste has run out.

> Go for the wings.
> Try a plunging attack.
> Have Tatsumaki slam it down.
> Other.
